sentences.en: BrightFarms, for example, together with a firm called Better Food Solutions, began constructing a large single-storey glasshouse on the roof of a big supermarket in October.
sentences.cn: 比如，光明农场系统公司现在正在和一家名为“好上好食品”（BetterFood Solutions）的公司合作，自10月份开始在一家大超市的屋顶上建造一座单层的大温室。

sentences.en: I live in my own little 24 glasshouse.
sentences.cn: 我就住在自己的小天地里.

sentences.en: I'm not the flower which cultivated in the glasshouse!
sentences.cn: 我不是温室里呵护的花朵!

sentences.en: Maldives on the waterfront that we have a large glasshouse yard desire.
sentences.cn: 马尔代夫海滨上那个大玻璃屋子里有着我们的向往.

sentences.en: P - who live in glasshouse shouldn't throw stones.
sentences.cn: 住玻璃房子的人切忌扔石头;秃子别骂和尚;五十步别笑百步;自己有错误就别去批评别人.

sentences.en: Sea the south vegetable contain beautiful natural glasshouse, tropical orchard call.
sentences.cn: 海南素有“天然温室 、 热带果园”美称.

sentences.en: That method has the good function in modern glasshouse.
sentences.cn: 该方法在现代温室中有很好的实用性.

sentences.en: The heat accumulation of glasshouse were so serious that it required the highly volume ventilation.
sentences.cn: 玻璃温室之热累积十分严重因此必须以大量之机械通风方能克服.

sentences.en: The method is used commercially, especially for glasshouse crops, and also in experimental work in determining the effects of mineral deficiencies.
sentences.cn: 此法经常在商业中使用，尤其是针对一些温室作物，或者用于验证矿质元素的缺乏对植物产生的影响的实验。

sentences.en: With the year increased and the soil sandy increased, the glasshouse cucumber's wilt disease increased.
sentences.cn: 研究结果表明黄瓜枯萎病随着连作年限的增加,土壤砂性增加而增加.

sentences.en: You must grow these tropical flowers in a glasshouse.
sentences.cn: 你必须把这些热带花卉种在温室里.

trans.tran_en: a building made mainly of glass which is used for growing plants
